Topic.Title: 'DevMode' and 'Choose a location where to start' active

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

We are making an adventure game with Quest and when editing the game we tapped the DevMode active and 'Choose a location where to start' tap and after that the game was not able to be edited. The game can be started and played still.

Do you have a way how to untap the Devmode active and  'Choose a location where to start' so we could go back to the previous state. Or any other way how to be able to edit the game again?

Thank you in advance.

Regards,
Alex
